scripts.preview:build: npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.preview:dev: npm run build:dev && vite preview --mode development
scripts.analyze: vite build --mode production && npx vite-bundle-analyzer dist
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && powershell "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules, package-lock.json -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.optimize: npm run clean && npm run build:analyze
scripts.size-check: npm run build && powershell "Get-ChildItem dist -Recurse | Measure-Object -Property Length -Sum | Select-Object @{Name='Size';Expression={'{0:N2} MB' -f ($_.Sum / 1MB)}}"
